name: Finding Anastasia (itch)
description:
The Russian Empire has fallen. with it the death of the royal family. However, the Empress Has heard the great news! Anastasia lives! Yet many imposters claim to be the missing daughter of Tsar Nicholas II. some with malicious intentions.

Finding Anastasia is a social deduction game for 4 to 8 players. Set at a ball hosted by the Empress. Players work out who is indeed Anastasia by asking questions. Some ask questions to return her to the throne. Others for their own Malicious gains.

Play the Card game! Visit the Kickstarter Here!
